An abyssal bracelet is made by casting the Lvl-4 Enchant spell on a diamond bracelet, requiring a Magic level of 57. Diamond bracelets can be made at level 58 Crafting.

Wearing the bracelet will prevent the player from being skulled when entering the Abyss, thus making it safer to wear teleport jewellery such as the amulet of glory without the risk of losing them to a PKer. Each bracelet holds 5 charges, and 1 charge is used each time the wearer enters the Abyss. When all charges are used, the bracelet crumbles to dust.

Price per charge[edit | edit source]

Because the high alchemy value is the same regardless of the number of charges, some of the cost of usage can be reclaimed by alching when one charge remains.

Item Bracelet Cost Cost Per Charge Cost if Alching[n 1]

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 March 2022
(update)

Fixed a visual bug that appeared while wearing the abyssal bracelet and teleporting to the Abyss.

31 August 2017
(update)

Partially charged versions of the item could now be turned into bank placeholders.

26 February 2015
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Abyssal brace" to "Abyssal bracelet".
  • Partially charged versions of the item were made untradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.

[[File:Abyssal bracelet detail.png|left|140px]]
An '''abyssal bracelet''' is made by casting the [[Lvl-4 Enchant]] spell on a [[diamond bracelet]], requiring a [[Magic]] level of 57. Diamond bracelets can be made at level 58 [[Crafting]].

Wearing the bracelet will prevent the player from being [[Skull (status)|skulled]] when entering the [[Abyss]], thus making it safer to wear teleport jewellery such as the [[amulet of glory]] without the risk of losing them to a [[PKer]]. Each bracelet holds 5 charges, and 1 charge is used each time the wearer enters the Abyss. When all charges are used, the bracelet crumbles to dust.
